div.div:
Ranges for detecting signals and pauses of the NEC-IR-protocol
T_LEADSIGNAL_MIN_US = 7000
T_LEADSIGNAL_MAX_US = 11000
T_LEADPAUSE_MIN_US = 3000
T_LEADPAUSE_MAX_US = 6000
T_BITPAUSE_MIN_US = 200
T_BITPAUSE_MAX_US = 2000
T_BITPAUSE_THRESHOLD_ZERO_ONE = 1100

switch.text: Ranges for detecting signals and pauses of the...

n = number of bits received after LeadSignal en LeadPause
m = message, with reverted bits

div.div:
When a pause exceeds 6000 us, a pauseDetected event is sent. (otherwise, with a flexible amount of bytes, the necReceiver would not know very soon that no new bits are coming)
T_MAX_PAUSE_US = 6000

switch.text: When a pause exceeds 6000 us, a pauseDetected e...
